item.title: Saddam Hussein Part 2: Enforcer, Frontman, Mafia Godfather
item.description: Saddam consolidates his own power base, appointing friends and relatives to key positions. We hear a remarkable account from a woman whose own family was targeted by his secret police. Soon, the deputy will be in pole position to move against his mentor. And after that, Saddam will shore up the loyalty of his party with an act of political theatre for the ages… A Noiser production, written by Duncan Barrett. Get every episode of Real Dictators a week early with Noiser+... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/NSR6187882468

item.title: Balamuthia in the brain with Natasha Spottiswoode
item.description: At the meeting of the American Society for Tropical Medicine and Hygeine in Chicago, Natasha joins TWiP to solve the case of the Man with a Generalized Seizure and Infectious Forms in the Brain. Hosts: , , , and Christina Naula... Feed: http://twip.microbeworld.libsynpro.com/rss
